# flow open

Returns the flow for a stock. /flow, /flow wk, /flow open, /flow unu, /flow prem

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/flow open [ticker]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker - Not required for subcmd: unu | True | None |
